title: Investment Club
text:
Investment Club starts in September 2024.
Join this group to register & receive updates.
View our info document here
Investment club covers a variety of strategies for trading stocks,
To see the full list of topics, view our guide.

Investment Club gives an understanding of investments in the stock market and provides different strategies for positive returns in the stock market. Members are also able to execute realistic trades in a simulated environment.
Disclaimer:
This club is solely focused on the stock market and related aspects, and will not cover cryptocurrency.

title: Guide
text:
Throughout the year, we will hold meetings. At these meetings, different strategies for returns on the stock market will be discussed and demonstrated.

Stock ideas and strategies can also be exchanged at meetings.

Below is the full list of planned topics we will cover.
These include, but are not limited to:
 -Buying & Selling
-Shorting & Covering
-Volume, market-cap, PE ratio, beta
-Dividends
-Index funds and indexes
-Acquisitions (impact)
-Volatilities
-Varying factors affecting stock price
-Option trading (puts & calls)
-Graph analysis
-Earnings reports and significance
